segments.text: Why didn't you text me last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? I sent you three or four messages !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't get any of them . I was waiting for you to text me the address of where the party was and I never got your message .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why didn't you just call ? I hate sending SMS messages .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , because I didn't have any credit on my phone . I used it all up this month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought you had an unlimited SMS plan ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I do , but if I don't have any credit in my phone , it won't let me call or send messages .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No wonder you didn't get my texts !
segments.speaker: S2
